localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Tuti.study is a webapp that helps teachers and students to improve the way they learn online. You can create beautiful annonated presentations, create, save, share your online flashcards with students, friends and colleagues by sharing a link.
blogPost.body: Tuti.study is a webapp that helps teachers and students to improve the way they learn online. You can create beautiful annonated presentations, create, save, share your online flashcards with students, friends and colleagues by sharing a link.
blogPost.title: Tuti - Create beautiful online presentations and flashcards
blogPost.author: Rukshan

localize.description: Tuti.study是一款帮助教师和学生改善在线学习方式的网络应用。你可以创建漂亮的注解演示，创建、保存、分享你的在线闪卡，通过分享链接与学生、朋友和同事分享。
localize.tagline: 创建漂亮的在线演示和闪卡

localize.description: Tuti.study是一款幫助教師和學生改善在線學習方式的網絡應用。你可以創建漂亮的註解演示，創建、保存、分享你的在線閃卡，通過分享鏈接與學生、朋友和同事分享。
localize.tagline: 創建漂亮的在線演示和閃卡

previous.excerpt: omniquotient is an assessment tool that helps you learn if you are using the tech community's recommended practices in programming, and if not, it shows you how you can improve the way you code.
previous.title: omniquotient - Assess and grow your knowledge as a developer

localize.description: omniquotient是一个评估工具，它可以帮助你了解你是否在编程中使用了技术社区推荐的实践，如果没有，它就会告诉你如何改进你的编码方式。
localize.tagline: 评估并增长您作为开发人员的知识

localize.description: omniquotient是一個評估工具，它可以幫助你瞭解你是否在編程中使用了技術社區推薦的實踐，如果沒有，它就會告訴你如何改進你的編碼方式。
localize.tagline: 評估並增長您作爲開發人員的知識

next.excerpt: Can’t remember where you saved your Bank Account Number? Need quick access to your CV or the digital copy of your Passport? That’s why we created Clipboard PRO: the easiest way to find, copy and paste all your information with a tap!
next.title: Clipboard PRO - Fast access to all your most used content

localize.description: 不记得自己的银行账号保存在哪里了？需要快速访问您的简历或护照的电子版？这就是为什么我们创造了剪贴板专业版：最简单的方式来查找、复制和粘贴您的所有信息，只需轻点一下。
localize.tagline: 快速访问所有您最常用的内容

localize.description: 不記得自己的銀行賬號保存在哪裏了？需要快速訪問您的簡歷或護照的電子版？這就是爲什麼我們創造了剪貼板專業版：最簡單的方式來查找、複製和粘貼您的所有信息，只需輕點一下。
localize.tagline: 快速訪問所有您最常用的內容
